org.fujion.annotation

Class AbstractClassScanner<T,A extends Annotation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.annotation.AbstractClassScanner<T,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of target class.
    A - Type of annotation class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentScanner, EventTypeScanner

    public abstract class AbstractClassScanner<T,A extends Annotation>
extends Object
    Abstract base class for scanning class-level annotations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates and registers a component definition for a class by scanning the named class and its superclasses for method annotations.

      • scanClass

        public void scanClass(String className)
        Creates and registers a component definition for a class by scanning the named class and its superclasses for method annotations.
        Parameters:
        className - Fully qualified name of the class to scan.

      • scanClass

        public void scanClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Creates and registers a component definition for a class by scanning the class and its superclasses for method annotations.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to scan.

        protected abstract void doScanClass(Class<T> clazz)

        Parameters:
